scripts.start: tsc ./src/index && cp ./src/download_card_data.json ./dist/download_card_data.json && cp ./src/download_skill_data.json ./dist/download_skill_data.json && cp ./src/serviceAccount.json ./dist/serviceAccount.json && cp ./src/AIServiceAccount.json ./dist/AIServiceAccount.json && cp ./.env ./dist/.env && forever ./dist/index.js
scripts.start-windows: tsc ./src/index && copy ./src/download_card_data.json ./dist/download_card_data.json && copy ./src/download_skill_data.json ./dist/download_skill_data.json && copy ./src/serviceAccount.json ./dist/serviceAccount.json && copy ./src/AIServiceAccount.json ./dist/AIServiceAccount.json && copy ./.env ./dist/.env && forever ./dist/index.js
